Notifying Surviving Spouses in Survivors Pension Cases
If DEA eligibility is established, but the eligible surviving spouse is in receipt of Survivors Pension, then
include notice of eligibility for DEA in the decision notice only, and
enclose
VA Form 21-8767, Death Pension Award Attachment
